documents.name: Cookies
documents.text:
Cookies
Google Analytics informs us about how you use the Lingerie Lowdown® website

Lingerie Lowdown® puts small files (known as ‘cookies’) onto your computer to collect information about how you browse the site.

Cookies are used to:

  • Measure how you use our website so it can be updated and improved based on your needs
  • Remember the notifications you’ve seen so that we don’t show them to you again
  • Lingerielowdown.com cookies aren’t used to identify you personally
  • You’ll normally see a message on the site before we store a cookie on your computer

Find out more about how to manage cookies.

How cookies are used on lingerielowdown.com

We use Google Analytics software to collect information about how you use lingerielowdown.com. We do this to help make sure the site is meeting the needs of our users and to help us make improvements, eg improving site search.

Google Analytics stores information about:

  • The pages you visit on lingerielowdown.com
  • How long you spend on each lingerielowdown.com page
  • How you got to the site
  • What you click on while you’re visiting the site

The cookies don’t collect or store your personal information (eg your name or address) so this information can’t be used to identify who you are when you are visiting the website.

We don’t allow Google to use or share our analytics data and we don’t share this data with any third parties.

Last updated: 22 May 2018

documents.name: Terms and Conditions
documents.text:
Terms and Conditions
You are agreeing to our terms of use by visiting the Lingerie Lowdown® website

By visiting and using our services, you are agreeing to our terms of use as outlined below.

Who we are

Lingerie Lowdown® is the trading name of WDS Digital Media Limited who manage the lingerielowdown.com website and associated profile pages on social network sites.

Using lingerielowdown.com

You agree to use lingerielowdown.com only for lawful purposes. You must also use it in a way that doesn’t infringe the rights of, or restrict or inhibit the use and enjoyment of, this site by anyone else. We update lingerielowdown.com all the time. We can change or remove content at any time without notice.

Services and transactions

You can use lingerielowdown.com to access online reviews and other content relating to the purpose of the Lingerie Lowdown® website. We manage all content published on our website. Transactions are managed through PayPal. They have their own terms and conditions which also apply – read these before you use the service.

Refunds

If you are not totally satisfied with the Lingerie Lowdown® website after joining, you are eligible for a full refund within 14 days of purchase. If you have any additional questions or would like to request a refund, feel free to contact us.

Recurring memberships

All of our current plans for 1, 3, 6 and 12 month memberships are non-recurring payments and can not be cancelled. If you wish to request a refund for one of these memberships, please refer to our standard refund policy above. Once your membership has expired, no further payments are charged to your debit/credit card used for the initial payment.

Renewing a membership

If your membership has expired, you can renew your membership at any time. Log in to your account and purchase a new membership of your choice. Upon a successful payment, your account will become active again to give you full access to the Lingerie Lowdown® website.

Expired accounts

Once your membership has expired, your account will remain on our database for a maximum of two years. This will allow you to log in at any point to renew your membership to the Lingerie Lowdown® website. If your account remains inactive for more than two years, we will automatically delete the account from our database.

Linking to lingerielowdown.com

We welcome and encourage other websites to link to lingerielowdown.com. You must contact us for permission if you want to:

  • Say your website or product is associated with or endorsed by Lingerie Lowdown® or any presenter that is currently, or has previously provided reviews for our website
Linking from lingerielowdown.com

Lingerie Lowdown® may provide links to websites that are managed by other businesses, service providers or other organisations. We don’t have any control over the content on these websites.

We’re not responsible for:

  • The protection of any information you give to these websites
  • Any loss or damage that may come from your use of these websites, or any other websites they link to

You agree to release us from any claims or disputes that may come from using these websites. You should read all terms and conditions, privacy policies and end user licences that relate to these websites before you use them.

Using lingerielowdown.com content

All content published on lingerielowdown.com is copyrighted to Lingerie Lowdown® – © 2021-2016 Lingerie Lowdown®. All rights reserved. This includes all our content distributed via our social media channels.

Any redistribution or reproduction of part or all of the contents in any form is strictly prohibited. You may not, except with our express written permission, distribute or commercially exploit the content. Nor may you transmit it or store it on any other website or other form of electronic retrieval system.

Disclaimer

While we make every effort to keep lingerielowdown.com up to date, we don’t provide any guarantees, conditions or warranties that the information will be:

  • Current
  • Accurate
  • Complete
  • Free from bugs or viruses

We’re not liable for any loss or damage that may come from using the lingerielowdown.com website. This includes:

  • Any direct, indirect or consequential losses
  • Any loss or damage caused by civil wrongs (‘tort’, including negligence), breach of contract or otherwise
  • The use of lingerielowdown.com and any websites that are linked to or from it
  • The inability to use lingerielowdown.com and any websites that are linked to or from it

This applies if the loss or damage was foreseeable, arose in the normal course of things or you advised us that it might happen.

This includes (but isn’t limited to) the loss of your:

  • Income or revenue
  • Salary, benefits or other payments
  • Business
  • Profits or contracts
  • Opportunity
  • Anticipated savings
  • Data
  • Goodwill or reputation
  • Tangible property
  • Intangible property, including loss, corruption or damage to data or any computer system
  • Wasted management or office time

We may still be liable for:

  • Death or personal injury arising from our negligence
  • Fraudulent misrepresentation
  • Any other liability which cannot be excluded or limited under applicable law
Requests to remove content

You can ask for content to be removed from lingerielowdown.com. We’ll only do this in certain cases, eg if it breaches copyright laws, contains sensitive personal data or material that may be considered obscene or defamatory.

Contact us to ask for content to be removed. You’ll need to send us the web address (URL) of the content and explain why you think it should be removed. We’ll reply to let you know whether we’ll remove it. We remove content at our discretion. You can still request information under the Freedom of Information Act and the Data Protection Act.

Information about you and your visits to lingerielowdown.com

We collect information about you in accordance with our privacy policy and our cookie policy. By using lingerielowdown.com, you agree to us collecting this information and confirm that any data you provide is accurate.

Virus protection

We make every effort to check and test lingerielowdown.com for viruses at every stage of production. You must make sure that the way you use lingerielowdown.com doesn’t expose you to the risk of viruses, malicious computer code or other forms of interference which can damage your computer system.

We’re not responsible for any loss, disruption or damage to your data or computer system that might happen when you use lingerielowdown.com.

Viruses, hacking and other offences

When using lingerielowdown.com, you must not introduce viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs or any other material that’s malicious or technologically harmful.

You must not try to gain unauthorised access to lingerielowdown.com, the server on which it’s stored or any server, computer or database connected to it.

You must not attack lingerielowdown.com in any way. This includes denial-of-service attacks.

We’ll report any attacks or attempts to gain unauthorised access to lingerielowdown.com to the relevant law enforcement authorities and share information about you with them.

Governing law

These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales. Any dispute you have which relates to these terms and conditions, or your use of lingerielowdown.com (whether it be contractual or non-contractual), will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

Abusive behaviour

We allow members to comment on all reviews we publish. We request that all members are polite and respect the team. Any abusive comments or harassment of our presenters will result in your membership being terminated and no refund will be offered.

General

There may be legal notices elsewhere on lingerielowdown.com that relate to how you use the site. We’re not liable if we fail to comply with these terms and conditions because of circumstances beyond our reasonable control.

We might decide not to exercise or enforce any right available to us under these terms and conditions. We can always decide to exercise or enforce that right at a later date.

Doing this once won’t mean we automatically waive the right on any other occasion.

If any of these terms and conditions are held to be invalid, unenforceable or illegal for any reason, the remaining terms and conditions will still apply.

18 USC 2257

Lingerie Lowdown® abides by the compliance rules and procedures regarding all content on the website.

All presenters must be over 18 years of age or age required by their State, jurisdiction or Country if more than 18 years old and are personally identified and verified by Lingerie Lowdown® prior to working with the website. Presenters freely consent to appear in the reviews at the time of its production and agree to it being published on the website as well as edited content appearing on our social media channels.

Company details

WDS Digital Media Limited, trading as Lingerie Lowdown®
International House
776 – 778 Barking Road
Barking
London E13 9PJ
Company register : Companies House (England)
Company registration number : 10537637
VAT number : GB360587484

Changes to the Lingerie Lowdown® terms and conditions

Please check these terms and conditions regularly. We can update them at any time without notice. You’ll agree to any changes if you continue to use lingerielowdown.com after the terms and conditions have been updated.

Last updated: 18 October 2021

documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Privacy Policy
We collect certain information when you visit the Lingerie Lowdown® website

When you visit the Lingerie Lowdown® website, we may collect certain information or data about you and this may include:

  • Questions, queries or feedback you leave, including your email address if you send an email to lingerielowdown.com
  • Your IP address, and details of which version of web browser you used
  • Information on how you use the site, using cookies and page tagging techniques to help us improve the website
  • Details to allow you to access services and transactions, eg an email address (you’ll always be told when this information is being collected, and it will only be used for the purpose you provide it for)

This information is collected as it allows us to:

  • Improve the website by monitoring how you use it
  • Respond to any feedback you send us
  • Provide you with information about subscriptions or other services we may provide

We can’t personally identify you using your data.

Where your data is stored

We store your data on our secure servers in the UK. By submitting your personal data, you agree to this.

Keeping your data secure

Transmitting information over the internet is generally not completely secure, and we can’t guarantee the security of your data. Any data you transmit is at your own risk. We have procedures and security features in place to try and keep your data secure once we receive it. We won’t share your information with any other organisations for marketing, market research or commercial purposes, and we will never pass on your details to other websites.

Disclosing your information

We may pass on your personal information if we have a legal obligation to do so, or if we have to enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements.

Your rights to have data removed

You have the right to have data we may hold on you removed. Contact us to ask for your details to be removed from our secure servers. Please note that if you have a valid membership, removal of data we hold will prevent you gaining access to the website.

Links to other websites

Lingerie Lowdown® may contain links to and from other websites within it’s pages. This privacy policy only applies to this website, and doesn’t cover other websites or services that we link to.

Following a link to another website

If you visit another website from a link found on the Lingerie Lowdown® website, read the privacy policy on that website to find out what it does with your information.

Following a link to lingerielowdown.com from another website

If you come to lingerielowdown.com from another website, we may receive personal information about you from the other website. You should read the privacy policy of the website you came from to find out more about this.

Last updated: 27 June 2021
